overview: A 'queer' guy is banned from using the elevator (the ease of life) hence he has to take a long scary stairway (a struggle-full journey) to reach his destination. On each floor, he faces a new challenge and discovers a new experience. Are these experiences enough for him to be 'proud' of his 'identity' and to motivate him to raise the voice against the discrimination and violence against the LGBTH community?
title: Untold Unheard Story
